backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two high-confidence features related to reverting and auditing data-fetching logic in useQueries.ts and actor wiring between frontend and backend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering components, hooks, types, utilities, and CSV handling across the SurgiPaw frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app manifest, icons, and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for auth flows and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky header layout.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component for the Culture task, rendering a database/cylinder shape with optional completed-state styling.
SVG workflow icon component for the Daily Summary task, rendering a tear-off calendar with binding holes and a date number.
SVG workflow icon component for the Discharge Notes task, rendering a document with a checkmark and optional completed-state styling.
Renders a follow-up workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a refresh/clock SVG path and the followUp color token.
Renders a histology workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a sun/radial SVG path and the histo color token.
Renders an imaging workflow icon using a grayscale X-ray bone image, with an optional X overlay when completed.
Renders a labs workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a flask SVG path and the labs color token.
Renders a PDVM-notified workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a speech-bubble SVG path and the pdvmNotified color token.
Renders a surgery report workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a document/plus SVG path and the surgeryReport color token.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a workflowType string to the corresponding specific workflow icon component.
Base SVG wrapper for workflow icons that applies consistent size and stroke styling, and overlays an X when isCompleted is true.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Defines shared design tokens for workflow icons: color values per workflow type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all workflow task types and provides helper functions to derive task selections, remaining items, and colors from a Task object.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Compact card component for calendar views that displays a surgery case's species icon, pet name, complaint, and toggleable workflow task icons.
Expandable card component for a surgery case showing patient details, workflow task toggle icons, and edit/delete actions.
A dialog component for editing an existing surgery case, pre-populating form fields from the case data and submitting updates via the `useUpdateCase` mutation hook.
A dialog component for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient info, species, sex, and task selections, submitting via the `useCreateCase` mutation hook.
The main list view for surgery cases, handling fetching, filtering by species/tasks/search, sorting, and rendering case cards along with controls for creating cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select component for choosing the sort order of the cases list using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to session storage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task type and completion status, persisting selections to session storage.
Renders the selected checklist tasks for a surgery case as toggleable icon buttons, visually indicating completed tasks with strikethrough and reduced opacity.
React component providing CSV import and export functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, error display, and backend create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A controlled date input component supporting MM/DD/YYYY keyboard entry with auto-slash insertion, blur validation, and a calendar popover picker.
Implements CSV export (serializing SurgeryCase arrays to a downloadable file) and CSV import (parsing, validating rows, and matching against existing cases) for surgery cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides pure functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: Custom React hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Utility that preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses structured 'Label: Value' text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with voice input variations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with incomplete tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a query string, matching against case fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines the CaseFormData interface and constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields, date parsing (MM/DD/YYYY, ISO), date-to-nanoseconds conversion, and Species/Sex enum parsing utilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases in either a weekly calendar or list view, with filtering, sorting, search, and a new case creation dialog.
Weekly calendar React component that renders a 7-column grid of surgery cases grouped by arrival date, with week navigation controls.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/ca: Utility functions for the calendar view, including computing week day arrays, filtering cases by day, formatting week range strings, and checking if a week is the current one.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract and count remaining open checklist tasks across surgery cases, returning structured OpenTaskItem objects.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced result.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of TanStack Query hooks for all backend data operations including cases, user profiles, tasks, and dashboard data, using a direct actor factory that bypasses the broken initialization call in useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a light-blue themed design system, with tokens for colors, radius, and semantic UI elements like complaints and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that renders the root component wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended for jspdf-autotable type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended for jsPDF type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for `tesseract.js`, defining interfaces for workers, OCR results, bounding boxes, and enums for PSM and OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the `tailwindcss-animate` and `@tailwindcss/typography` plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking known issues (blank page due to broken data-fetching), existing fix features, and a pending action request to diagnose the backend actor and revert data-fetching logic to Version 107.
